segments.text: What can I do for you , Madam ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'd like to buy a pair of leather shoes .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How about this pair ? They're well-made .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But they are a little tight , They Pinch .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: In fact , They'll stretch a bit later .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know.But can you show me a little larger size ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: This pair fits me perfectly . I feel comfortable .
segments.speaker: S2
